## Set up a connection to the species plus database

To set up a connection to the Species+/CITES database an authentication token
is required. Therefore to use `citesr`, the user must first sign up on the
[Species+/CITES API website](http://api.speciesplus.net/users/sign_up).
Below we assume that the user already possesses a token and consider it
to be `8QW6Qgh57sBG2k0gtt` (as used on the API documentation see
https://api.speciesplus.net/documentation).

To use the set the token the user can use one of the three options available below

1. set an environment variable `SPPPLUS_TOKEN` in  [`.Renviron`](https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/base/html/Startup.html) file (preferred);

2. use `sppplus_login()`, *i.e.* interactively set `SPPPLUS_TOKEN` up
for the current R session (meaning you will have to do it again during the next session);

![](inst/assets/img/sppplus_login.png)

3. use the `token` argument of the functions, *i.e.* pass the token to every
function calls.
